# Virtual environments
venv/
.venv/
env/

# Python compiled files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo

# IDE-specific files (e.g., VS Code, PyCharm)
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Flask-specific
instance/
# If you are using a specific database file, add it here (e.g., development.db)
# *.db

# Operating system generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Environment variables / API keys (if you ever use them directly in files)
.env
*.env
*.secret

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Any specific image cache or generated files
static/images/generated/
